attribute.name: time
attribute.description: Time used by monitoring in ms

attribute.name: captureStatusVmm
attribute.description: Capture status of VMM0-7

attribute.name: parityCounterVmm
attribute.description: Parity error counter of VMM0-7

attribute.name: statusSroc
attribute.description: Status of sROC0-4

attribute.name: seu
attribute.description: Single event upset flag

attribute.name: seuCounter
attribute.description: SEU pulses counter

attribute.name: ePllVmm0.ePllInstantLock
attribute.description: VMM 0 Pll lock status. Should be true

attribute.name: ePllVmm1.ePllInstantLock
attribute.description: VMM 1 Pll lock status. Should be true

attribute.name: ePllTdc.ePllInstantLock
attribute.description: TDC 1 Pll lock status. Should be true

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllInstantLock
attribute.description: Core Pll lock status. Should be true

attribute.name: l1_first
attribute.description: Value for first L1ID

attribute.name: even_parity
attribute.description: 1 if even parity 0 if odd parity

attribute.name: roc_id
attribute.description: ID to be used in null event headers

attribute.name: elinkSpeed.sRoc0
attribute.description: ELink speed of SROC 0 0x0 = 640 Mb/s; 0x1 = 320 Mb/s; 0x2 = 160 Mb/s; 11 = 0x3 Mb/s

attribute.name: elinkSpeed.sRoc1
attribute.description: ELink speed of SROC 1 0x0 = 640 Mb/s; 0x1 = 320 Mb/s; 0x2 = 160 Mb/s; 11 = 0x3 Mb/s

attribute.name: elinkSpeed.sRoc2
attribute.description: ELink speed of SROC 2 0x0 = 640 Mb/s; 0x1 = 320 Mb/s; 0x2 = 160 Mb/s; 11 = 0x3 Mb/s

attribute.name: elinkSpeed.sRoc3
attribute.description: ELink speed of SROC 3 0x0 = 640 Mb/s; 0x1 = 320 Mb/s; 0x2 = 160 Mb/s; 11 = 0x3 Mb/s

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Timeout for all the sROCs on wait for L0 data from a VMM in multiple of 2 BC

attribute.description: Driver output current for eport tx

attribute.description: Value which is loaded into the BCID counter when receiving BCR

attribute.description: Maximum value of the BCID counter

attribute.description: The maximum number of events sent back-to-back without commas between them

attribute.description: VMM Pll 0 filter parameters (should be 0x8)

attribute.description: Disable a certain Pll phase of VMM Pll 0 (should be 0xFF)

attribute.description: Core Pll filter parameters (should be 0x8)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllIcp
attribute.description: Core Pll filter parameters (should be 0x8)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllEnablePhase
attribute.description: Disable a certain Pll phase of core Pll (should be 0xFF)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllPhase40MHz_0
attribute.description: 40 MHz internal clock phase (triplicated)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllPhase40MHz_1
attribute.description: 40 MHz internal clock phase (triplicated)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllPhase40MHz_2
attribute.description: 40 MHz internal clock phase (triplicated)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllPhase160MHz_0
attribute.description: 160 MHz internal clock phase (triplicated)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllPhase160MHz_1
attribute.description: 160 MHz internal clock phase (triplicated)

attribute.name: ePllCore.ePllPhase160MHz_2
attribute.description: 160 MHz internal clock phase (triplicated)

attribute.name: ePllCore.tp_bypass_global
attribute.description: Send TP on TTC clock instead of at the ROC clock phase adjustment

attribute.name: ePllCore.tp_phase_global
attribute.description: Phase of 320MHz clock

attribute.name: tdsBcrInvert
attribute.description: Inverts the BCR signal

attribute.name: lockOutInvert
attribute.description: Changes polarity of Pll Lock output that goes to GPIO

attribute.name: testOutEnable
attribute.description: Just for testing

attribute.name: testOutMux
attribute.description: Just for testing

attribute.name: vmmBcrInvert
attribute.description: Inverts BCR polarity to VMM

attribute.name: vmmEnaInvert
attribute.description: Does same thing as Soft Reset, Each bit is 1 VMM. 1: VMM configuration mode, 0: VMM Acquisition mode

attribute.name: vmmL0Invert
attribute.description: Invert L0 polarity to VMM

attribute.name: vmmTpInvert
attribute.description: Invert TP polarity to VMM

attribute.name: conf_bcid_offset
attribute.description: BCID offset

attribute.name: conf_ro_bc_offset
attribute.description: Readout BC offset

attribute.name: trigger_rate
attribute.description: Coincidence trigger rate

attribute.name: xadc_temp
attribute.description: xADC FPGA temperature

attribute.name: pfeb_bcids
attribute.description: PFEB BCID

attribute.name: pfeb_status
attribute.description: PFEB status

attribute.name: pfeb_bcid_error
attribute.description: PFEB BCID alignment error

attribute.name: pad_bcid_error
attribute.description: Pad BCID error

attribute.name: pad_bcid_error_dif
attribute.description: Pad BCID error diff

attribute.name: pt_2_tp_lat
attribute.description: PT-2-TP latency

attribute.name: tp_bcid_error
attribute.description: TP BCID error

attribute.name: tp_bcid_error_dif
attribute.description: TP BCID error diff

attribute.name: ttc_bcr_ocr_rate
attribute.description: TTC BCR/OCR rate

attribute.name: gt_rx_lol
attribute.description: GT RX LOL

attribute.name: artFibersAlignment
attribute.description: 32 fiber alignment status

attribute.name: artFibersBcidGood
attribute.description: 32 fiber bcid the same as MMTP

attribute.name: idleState
attribute.description: Idle State Indicator

attribute.name: bcidOffset
attribute.description: BCID offset for BCID counter in Global Sync Module

attribute.name: suggestedBcidOffset
attribute.description: suggested BCID offset based on input ADDC BCID

attribute.name: nGoodOffset
attribute.description: number of ADDC that satisfies BCID offset

attribute.name: fiberBCIDs
attribute.description: Real time 4-bit LSB of BCID of each ART fiber

attribute.name: txMicropodTemp
attribute.description: Temperature of 3 TX micropods, indexed in MTP order

attribute.name: rxMicropodTemp
attribute.description: Temperature of 3 RX micropods, indexed in MTP order

attribute.name: txLoss
attribute.description: Loss of 36 TX fibers

attribute.name: rxLoss
attribute.description: Loss of 36 RX fiber

attribute.name: txFibersPower
attribute.description: 36 TX fiber power reading

attribute.name: rxArtFibersPower
attribute.description: 32 RX fiber power reading in uW (4 unconnected channel should read 0)

attribute.name: SLLatencyComp
attribute.description: Sector Logic Latancy comparison

attribute.name: bcrRate
attribute.description: counts the BCR rate per second

attribute.name: PadBCidSyncOk
attribute.description: BCID is incrementing properly T/F

attribute.name: PadHitRate
attribute.description: counts the pad hit rate per second

attribute.name: MMDisable
attribute.description: mm trigger path enabled or disabled

attribute.name: ToSLHitRate
attribute.description: samples the trigger rate decisions to SL per sec.

attribute.name: SectorID
attribute.description: sector ID

attribute.name: MMBCidSyncOk
attribute.description: continous reception of MM BCID T/F

attribute.name: PadIdleStatus
attribute.description: Pad idle T/F

attribute.name: MMIdleStatus
attribute.description: MM idle T/F

attribute.name: PadArrivalBC
attribute.description: counts from the moment OCR is received in the sTGC TP until the pad_idle_flag goes low

attribute.name: MMArrivalBC
attribute.description: counts from the moment OCR is received in the sTGC TP until the mm_idle_flag goes low

attribute.name: IgnorePads
attribute.description: sTGC pad in SL T/F

attribute.name: IgnoreMM
attribute.description: MM in SL T/F

attribute.name: DisableNSWMon
attribute.description: Disabled the NSWMON bit transmission to SL. T/F

attribute.name: L1AOpeningOffset
attribute.description: L1A opening offset. should be bigger than l1a_request_offset and l1a_closing_offset. Initial value 0x22.

attribute.name: L1ARequestOffset
attribute.description: L1A request offset. should GT l1a_closing_offset and LT l1a_closing_offset. Initial value 0x20.

attribute.name: L1AClosingOffset
attribute.description: L1A closing offset. should LT l1a_closing_offset and l1a_closing_offset. Initial value 0x1e.

attribute.name: L1ATimeoutWindow
attribute.description: L1A timeout window, should VGT l1a_opening_offset ~= l1a_request_offset + 0x20. Initial value 0x40.

attribute.name: L1APadEnabled
attribute.description: L1A pad stream packets enabled T/F

attribute.name: L1AMergeEnabled
attribute.description: L1A merge stream packets enabled T/F

attribute.name: StickyErrBCIDmatch
attribute.description: Run sync was lost once T/F

attribute.name: Busy
attribute.description: Busy T/F

attribute.name: MonDisabled
attribute.description: Monitoring disabled T/F

attribute.name: NSWMonLimit
attribute.description: Limit of the amount of NSW_MON segments to SL per sec.

attribute.name: MonLimit
attribute.description: Monitoring Limit on the Elink rate. default 1kHz

attribute.name: MM_NSWMonEnabled
attribute.description: NSW_MON coming from MM TP segments goes all the way to CTP. T/F

attribute.name: bcrRate
attribute.description: counts the BCR rate per second

attribute.name: SectorID
attribute.description: sector ID

attribute.name: PadIdleStatus
attribute.description: Pad idle T/F

attribute.name: MMIdleStatus
attribute.description: MM idle T/F
